channel.title: [Delta] RandQm or anyone other... why this happen? o.O [Fantasy world] [Delta]

server.process.run(process.java:29) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at server.stream.createFrame(stream.java:38) at server.client.logout(client.java:10177) at server.PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:383) at server.PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:375) at server.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:262) at server.process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (JonasChristophe) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at server.client.fillInStream(client.java:8743) at server.client.run(client.java:18163) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (JonasChristophe) [/code] The "JonasChristophe" is my ip, i tryed to change the 127.0.0.1 to 5.55.173.244 because i got that error when it was on 127.0.0.1 too :S whats wrong? :S

item.title: [Delta] RandQm or anyone other... why this happen? o.O [Fantasy world] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

man, on the source cmd shit, it says JonasChristophe because that is my computers name or whatever, when it connect to this ip: 5.55.173.244 it says that jonaschristophe :S i change the ip in client and source from 127.0.0.1 to 5.55.173.244 and get that error :S the same error came when the ip was 127.0.0.1, so whats wrong, u know…? (btw, log on skype )

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] RandQm or anyone other... why this happen? o.O [Fantasy world] [Delta]

item.title: [Delta] RandQm or anyone other... why this happen? o.O [Fantasy world] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

jonascristophe isn’t an ip
wtf are u sayin

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] RandQm or anyone other... why this happen? o.O [Fantasy world] [Delta]
